measure.CatchLine: Authorizes the Department of Human Services to license adult foster homes serving up to seven residents if the home meets specified criteria and pays the appropriate fee.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Digest: The Act allows DHS to license adult foster homes with up to seven residents. The Act sets out the requirements for licensing an adult foster home with six or seven residents. (Flesch Readability Score: 60.1). 
	Authorizes the Department of Human Services to license adult foster homes serving up to seven residents if the home meets specified criteria and pays the appropriate fee. 
	Takes effect on the 91st day following adjournment sine die.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to adult foster homes; creating new provisions; amending ORS 197.660, 443.400, 443.422, 443.705 and 443.734; and prescribing an effective date.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to adult foster homes; prescribing an effective date.

historyActions.ActionText: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
